text: sun lo! shudhd dharm allaah hee ke lie (yogy) hai tatha jinhonne bana rakha hai allaah ke siva sanrakshak, ve kahate hain ki ham to unakee vandana isalie karate hain ki vah sameep kar dengen hamen allaah[1] se. vaastav mein, allaah hee nirnay karega unake beech jisamen ve vibhed kar rahe hain. vaastav mein, allaah use supath nahin darshaata jo bada mithyaavaadee, krtaghn ho
